definitions.definition: ( now Scotland ) A length of cord , rope , twine , etc, used to bind something.

main_definition: ( now Scotland ) A length of cord , rope , twine , etc, used to bind something.

definitions.definition: A bundle carried by a hobo (usually containing his possessions), often on a stick slung over the shoulder; a blanket roll .
Any bundle or package ; specifically one containing narcotics such as cocaine , heroin , or morphine .

main_definition: ( US and Canada slang ) A bundle carried by a hobo (usually containing his possessions), often on a stick slung over the shoulder; a blanket roll .
secondary_definitions: ( Canada , US , slang ) Any bundle or package ; specifically one containing narcotics such as cocaine , heroin , or morphine .
